title: InterCure: Internationally Profitable Cannabis
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: InterCure is the most profitable cannabis company outside North America and recently uplisted to the Nasdaq. Israel's former Prime Minister, Chairman Ehud Barak and CEO Alex Rabinovitch join Rena Sherbill to discuss Israel's cannabis landscape and what investors can expect going forward. Europe's gradual progress, building a strong brand with top international names. Upside remains. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
